name: Douchebag Hero
description:
You saved those weak peasants from some bandits, nice move. But now, they worship you and you kinda like that. Why wouldn't you stick around and make these idiots build you a village? All you need to do is keep the raiders away so the villagers keep thinking you're some kind of hero.

I made this game for an AI project at Université du Québec à Chicoutimi. The main rule was to implement some kind of advanced AI in a game. I chose to do that with independant workers who would organize themselves to achieve the goals you give them (build stuff) while respecting some constraints: they have to take care of their energy and rely on the hero to protect them from the enemies. This AI works with a behavior tree and a finite state machine.

This is my second "big" project with Unity and making games in general.
